name: Curve Finance
description: Curve Finance is an automated market maker protocol designed for token swaps with low fees and slippage. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

en.name: Curve Finance
en.description: Curve Finance is an automated market maker protocol designed for token swaps with low fees and slippage. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

fr.name: Curve Finance
fr.description: Curve Finance est market maker automatisé conçu pour proposer des swaps de jetons avec des frais et du slippage peu élevés. Il s'agit d'un agrégateur de liquidités décentralisé où les utilisateurs peuvent ajouter leurs actifs dans plusieurs pools de liquidités différentes et gagner une partie des frais générés.

es.name: Curve Finance
es.description: Curve Finance es un creador automático de mercado diseñado para el intercambio de tokens con comisiones y deslizamiento bajo. Es un agregador de liquidez descentralizado donde el usuario puede agregar sus activos en múltiples pools de liquidez diferentes para ganar parte de las comisiones.

de.name: Curve Finance
de.description: Curve Finance ist ein automatisiertes Market-Maker-Protokoll, das für Token-Swaps mit niedrigen Gebühren und Slippage entwickelt wurde. Es ist ein dezentraler Liquiditätsaggregator, bei dem Nutzer ihre Vermögenswerte zu verschiedenen Liquiditätspools hinzufügen und Gebühren verdienen können.

pt.name: Curve Finance
pt.description: Curve Finance é um AMM designado para trocas entre tokens com taxas e slippages baixas. É um agregador descentralizado de liquidez onde os usuários podem adicionar seus ativos em diferentes pools de liquidez e receber taxas por isto.

el.name: Curve Finance
el.description: Curve Finance is an automated market maker protocol designed for token swaps with low fees and slippage. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

tr.name: Curve Finance
tr.description: Curve Finance, düşük ücretli ve patinajlı token takasları için tasarlanmış otomatik bir piyasa yapıcı protokolüdür. Kullanıcıların varlıklarını birkaç farklı likidite havuzuna ekleyebilecekleri ve ücret kazanabilecekleri merkezi olmayan bir likidite toplayıcıdır.

vi.name: Curve Finance
vi.description: Curve Finance is an automated market maker protocol designed for token swaps with low fees and slippage. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

zh.name: Curve Finance
zh.description: Curve Finance 是个自动做市商协议，它的设计允许用户以低费用和低滑点交换代币。它是个去中心化的流动性聚合器。用户可以将他们的资产添加到各个不同的流动性池中以赚取费用。

hi.name: Curve Finance
hi.description: Curve Finance एक स्वचालित मार्केट मेकर प्रोटोकॉल है जिसे कम शुल्क और फिसलन के साथ टोकन स्वैप के लिए डिज़ाइन किया गया है। यह एक विकेन्द्रीकृत तरलता एग्रीगेटर है जहां उपयोगकर्ता अपनी संपत्ति को कई अलग-अलग तरलता पूल में जोड़ सकते हैं और शुल्क कमा सकते हैं।

ja.name: Curve Finance
ja.description: Curve Financeは手数料が安くスリッページが少ないトークンのスワップのために設計された、自動マーケットメーカープロトコルです。分散型流動性アグリゲーターであり、ユーザーは自分の資産を複数の異なる流動性プールに追加し手数料を得ることができます。

id.description: Curve Finance is an automated market maker protocol designed for token swaps with low fees and slippage. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.
